content: I took the training video and passed the quiz on 10/24. I made a scale to Win account too. But when I click on a text assignment link, Scale to Win gives me an error message saying I haven't been invited to this organization and admin needs to add me. Please help!

Hi <@1299108639105093742> once you have made your account here, https://txt.democrats.org/STWTextJoin/
you should be able to use the reply links in the [Assignments](https://discord.com/channels/1242249109298221066/1296953885818355752) channel to join in on replies.
There will be assignments tomorrow.

If Scale to Win still says you need to be invited still please post in https://discord.com/channels/1242249109298221066/1296953962473455617

Having trouble with Scale to Win. I logged in, but the page I get to just tells me to log in again. I do, input my two-factor authentication code, and I'm back to the page that says Welcome to Scale to Win and tells me to Log In.

Texting is finished for today. You can still post in https://discord.com/channels/1242249109298221066/1296953962473455617 to share you email so you get the invite. Then Tomorrow you can use the links in Persuasion Team Assignments.
